answers.answer: http://www.diabetes.org/home.jsphttp://tinyurl.com/5nh97dhttp://tinyurl.com/555rfhhttp://tinyurl.com/55y9xmEat right, lose weight, moderate exercise, stay away from sugar.

question: Hello,I have type two diabetes and was wondering if there is any way to keep it low. Any kind of diet or food. Please be specific. So far i know garlic, onions and lemons help. Since last night my glucose level has ranged from 183(After Dinner)-271(After breakfast). Please give me advice for i am unable to get medical help.
title: Diabetes Diet
